mutants.code:
def insertBits(N, M, i, j):
    allOnes = ~0
    left = allOnes << j + 1
    right = (1 << i) + 1
    mask = left | right
    clearedN = N & mask
    shiftedM = M << i
    result = clearedN | shiftedM
    return result

def insertBits(N, M, i, j):
    allOnes = ~0
    left = allOnes << j + 1
    right = (1 << i) * 1
    mask = left | right
    clearedN = N & mask
    shiftedM = M << i
    result = clearedN | shiftedM
    return result
